data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hsu, Feng-Chuan, Esteves, Flavia A., Chou, Lien-Siang, Lin, Chung-Chi (2017): A new species of Stigmatomma from Taiwan (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Amblyoponinae). ZooKeys 705: 81-94, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.705.10296, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.705.10296
